articles.title: Next on FDA's agenda: Booster shots of Moderna, J&J vaccines -  The Atlanta Journal Constitution
articles.description: With many Americans who got Pfizer vaccinations already rolling up their sleeves for a booster shot, millions of others who received the Moderna or Johnson & Johnson vaccine wait anxiously to learn when it’s their turn.
